title: cryptomus_com
author: cryptomus_com
created_time: July 08, 2022, 02:11:51 PMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 03:39:30 PM by cryptomus_com
content: We are opening up the possibility of accepting payments in cryptocurrencies for websites, bots, applications and messengers. Integrate Cryptomus using the API, SDK for PHP and ready-made CMS plugins without KYC and other verifications, and if difficulties arise, our technical support is always in touch to resolve any issue.IntegrationsCurrently there are 2 types of integration available:1. Host-to-Host integration allows merchants to assign a static address for each user to replenish the balance. This is necessary for merchants whose services require a balance feature in the service user's personal account. Payments can be made using a static link ‚Äî take a look at the EXAMPLE, or using a static wallet address in the form of a text or QR code. In this case, users will not have to switch to the payment form.2. Connect integration allows you to automatically generate links to payments for goods or services. Using the API, you can track the payment status, so this integration method is no different from fiat acquiring, only much more reliable, cheaper and faster.White Label integration is now in development. This type of integration will allow merchants to personalize the payment page under the brand of their project.üí° If you need to create a one-time payment link or dedicate a single static address to top up your balance, then use the "Payment by Link" Business Wallet function. This feature is used when one needs to receive a transfer, but does not want to reveal a personal address.CommissionsFixed commission of 2% only when accepting payments. All other products of the platform are completely free and designed to work effectively with cryptocurrencies. If you pass moderation within the platform, commissions can be reduced up to 0.4%.üí° The fee for accepting payments can be assigned to the buyer, thereby acquiring crypto will be free for you. WithdrawalsInstant withdrawals without holds, rolling reserves and any restrictions. Use the API to assign automatic withdrawals to any external wallets with an auto-convert option. For example, there are ETH, USDT, TRX and TON on your wallets, but you can choose withdrawal in BTC ‚Äî we will convert everything at the current rate.üí° If you need to make a refund to the buyer, it will take only 2 clicks.Mass paymentsMass payments are available in any currency to every user. Convenient reporting and uploads will help you track transaction statuses.AnonymityWe do not require passing KYC or KYB to verify users or merchants. Authorization is available via Telegram or Tonkeeper, this guarantees you absolute anonymity.üí° Anonymity does not exempt transactions from the AML procedure. Do not use the platform for illegal purposes.Security and notification systemTwo-factor authentication, SMS confirmations, Anti-fraud system, Auto-withdrawals and many other useful tools ensure the security of your funds.Affiliate programThe affiliate program allows you to earn money with us. You will receive 30% of our payment commission from each merchant you have invited.ALL in One‚ÄãCryptomus is a platform that offers a comprehensive set of tools for effective work with cryptocurrencies. The wallet has built-in functions:‚Ä¢ A cryptocurrency converter that allows you to exchange cryptocurrencies for others at the current exchange rate without commissions;‚Äã‚Ä¢ Staking from 5% per annum for holders who prefer to store cryptocurrency in anticipation of the best price.‚ÄãIn the near future, we will release our own P2P exchange ‚Äì this product will help merchants work more efficiently with cryptocurrencies, thanks to the possibility of exchanging them for fiat funds and vice versa. You can find out more about future developments and innovations in our roadmap.Contact our client support team in Telegram: t.me/cryptomus_supportOr use the feedback form on the website: cryptomus.comEmail for cooperation: advertisement@cryptomus.com

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Currently there are 5 coins available: LTC, DASH, TRX, ETH, BTC and USDT. You can bill your clients in fiat currency, and we will automatically recalculate everything at the real exchange rate.Email: support@Cryptomus.comTelegram: @Cryptomus_support

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: We use 2fa for your security, which is a user authentication method in which two of the three possible authentication factors are combined to provide access to the service. Right now it's an email address, phone number, and password.¬†Email: support@cryptomus.comTelegram: @cryptomus_support

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Automatic conversion of received coins to any coin of your choice is available. Cryptoprocessing with us is simple.

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: What is cryptoprocessing?Cryptoprocessing is a modern payment tool, thanks to which customers pay for goods or services online not with ordinary money via bank data or payment systems, but with cryptocurrency. Agree that today's development of the cryptoindustry in one way or another requires merchants or merchants to integrate new payment solutions for doing business online.This possibility of using cryptoprocessing is not only convenient for buyers, but also beneficial for merchants integrating this payment method to their sites. That is, by accepting customers' money transfers in cryptocurrency, merchants save on commissions, the amount of which is significantly higher for ordinary bank transfers, and also increase the number of buyers, many of whom are eager to pay with cryptocurrency. Due to new payment approaches the client base and, correspondingly, the company's profit grows.Cryptomus gives everything necessary for comfortable and safe acceptance of cryptocurrency payments with the lowest commissions. Email: support@cryptomus.comTelegram: @cryptomus_support

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @cryptomus_comWould you mind providing a piece of evidence in regards to the "bank that gave you a license"?On the main page, you mentioned there are "no withdrawal limits", but that's "clearly not the case"!Care to explain why comments in your "What our clients say" section are fake?

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on July 23, 2022, 04:47:04 PM@cryptomus_comWould you mind providing a piece of evidence in regards to the "bank that gave you a license"?On the main page, you mentioned there are "no withdrawal limits", but that's "clearly not the case"!Care to explain why comments in your "What our clients say" section are fake?1. Information about the license will be added to the website shortly.2. We are also a platform for developers, API can be read here: https://doc.cryptomus.com/We do not have any restrictions on withdrawals. All finances are in your hands only. 3. Who would believe that these reviews are real?  The developers are joking a bit - we are adding and testing the testimonials block to the site. Soon it will work as it's supposed to, or we'll give it up altogether. We are a new project that wants to spread the word. We will be happy to answer all your questions!

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Cryptomus updates!1. Everynight tips on caring for your eyesGo to your personal Cryptomus account and enable Dark ModeWell done! You are excellent.2. Auto conversion is availableWant to protect yourself from volatility or convert less-used coins into more liquid ones? We'll give you that option.3. SecureYou can enable the ability to withdraw only to allowed in the personal account.4. Flexible 2fa systemWe are introducing a flexible authorization system that will allow you to manage the most important aspects of security.5. We have over 100,000 transactionsWe continue to strive for more. Stay tuned!Cryptomus.com ‚Äî receiving payments in cryptocurrency with a commission of 0.4%

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomus_com on July 25, 2022, 08:33:45 AM1. Information about the license will be added to the website shortly.I'm still [2 days after you made that comment] looking forward to that part being added to your website...Quote from: cryptomus_com on July 25, 2022, 08:33:45 AM3. Who would believe that these reviews are real?  The developers are joking a bit - we are adding and testing the testimonials block to the site. Soon it will work as it's supposed to, or we'll give it up altogether. We have over 100,000 transactionsThat's impressive for a new project, but you need to back it up with evidence!

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on July 27, 2022, 10:12:19 AMI'm still [2 days after you made that comment] looking forward to that part being added to your website...I'm pretty sure there are still people out there that believe everything that they read and when you're presenting your platform for the first time, you shouldn't include false information [regardless of it being a joke], but I'm glad you decided to remove it completely.That's impressive for a new project, but you need to back it up with evidence!It takes time to prepare documents. We will mark you as soon as it is ready. About transactions. The only option is a screenshot from the administration panel. But that makes no sense. You will meet our payment form more often - this will be the proof. Follow our updates on the website and telegram channel. There we will share our achievements and other important news. For now you can try to register on the site. Check the interface and explore the possibilities. We want to get feedback, if that is possible

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: New updates! 1. Transferring from personal to merchant account are availableIt will definitely be needed.2. Automatic withdrawalNow you can set up automatic withdrawal to your wallets. It easy. 3. SessionsAll your sessions are displayed in your personal account. You can terminate all other sessions or work with them separately.Stay tuned!

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomus_com on July 08, 2022, 02:11:51 PMOur service will suit you if:¬†‚ùñ If you need to accept payments without a websiteI can do that without your service. Why would I want to pay 3% and risk involving a third party? It's easier to receive a P2P payment on my own Bitcoin address.QuoteYour finances are safeYour service isn't trustless, right? It always strikes me as odd when any custodial claims to be "safe" without providing any guarantees. Let me put it this way: if you decide to run away, can you take your customers' money?QuoteWe do not require KYC procedures~All the money you receive will belong only to you and will never be frozen~We support AML (Anti-Money Laundering) policy supportThis doesn't add up. You can have at most 2 out of these 3 options at the same time.

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on July 31, 2022, 12:41:58 PMI can do that without your service. Why would I want to pay 3% and risk involving a third party? It's easier to receive a P2P payment on my own Bitcoin address. We have no fees if you get coins to your wallet from another wallet. Fees only on merchant accounts. Now merchant account fees start at 0.4% per cycle (withdrawal+acceptance) ‚Äî this is the lowest % on the market.QuoteYour service isn't trustless, right? It always strikes me as odd when any custodial claims to be "safe" without providing any guarantees. Let me put it this way: if you decide to run away, can you take your customers' money?Just for such issues, we have made an automatic instant withdrawal to your other wallets. Over time, we hope to earn your trust. The internal security system is well done and simple. Try it yourself - registration takes a few clicks. QuoteThis doesn't add up. You can have at most 2 out of these 3 options at the same time.Now we are finalizing the AML policy. We will elaborate on these points later.

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Hi! Big updates today üßä1. BlogWe are beginning to actively maintain a blog. New information about how you can interact with our platform and a lot of other useful information will appear on the site.2. Referral systemNow you can invite users to Cryptomus and get 0.05% from their every transaction. Referral code waiting for you in the personal settings. 3. Simplified integrationSDK for PHP ‚Äî now it's even easier to interact with our API.4. Fraud Detection SystemImproved the system. Don't worry about finances.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomus_com on August 01, 2022, 08:39:28 AMQuote from: LoyceV on July 31, 2022, 12:41:58 PMYour service isn't trustless, right? It always strikes me as odd when any custodial claims to be "safe" without providing any guarantees. Let me put it this way: if you decide to run away, can you take your customers' money?Just for such issues, we have made an automatic instant withdrawal to your other wallets. Over time, we hope to earn your trust. The internal security system is well done and simple. Try it yourself - registration takes a few clicks. Again, au automatic instant withdrawals that are controlled by you, so the problem of trust was not solved at all.LoyceV asked a simple question if you decide to run away, and since we have zero information about your "company" it men's that we must be prepared at any time to lose all out money, right?Quote from: cryptomus_com on July 25, 2022, 08:33:45 AM3. Who would believe that these reviews are real?  The developers are joking a bit - we are adding and testing the testimonials block to the site. Soon it will work as it's supposed to, or we'll give it up altogether. Are you sure that Binance would have had the same joking attitude seeing you're using their name and their CEO name without their consent on your website? This shows a lot about how you think business works, there are some lines nobody but scammer dare to cross when you want to present yourself as a real business.And these 5-star reviews from people with 1 review in their history are also legit, right, or this is another playful joke?https://www.trustpilot.com/review/cryptomus.comBottom line, you an unknown entity, with no headquarters, no license, no real life presence anywhere but you claim to have done 100 000 transactions already, common, at least try something else!!!!

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 07:53:59 AMLast edit: August 05, 2022, 09:33:57 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Great news! Big media is talking about us:Beincrypto and Bitcoinist released an article describing the features of our service.We are excited about these events and continue to work responsibly to ensure that the service remains stable and secure ‚ù§Quote from: stompix on July 31, 2022, 12:41:58 PMAgain, au automatic instant withdrawals that are controlled by you, so the problem of trust was not solved at all.LoyceV asked a simple question if you decide to run away, and since we have zero information about your "company" it men's that we must be prepared at any time to lose all out money, right?Placing the review block was indeed a mistake, but there will be no progress without mistakes. We will keep this experience in mind for the future.Just give us some time. We are in the process of registering the banking license and trademark. The company staff will be sure to be introduced as soon as we are ready. We haven't thought about Trustpilot recalls yet, we'll get to it. Thanks for sharing. In the post above, we shared sources that talk about us. We hope we have earned a little more trust. The answer to all of your questions will be to get a license and disclosure staff information. In this regard, we are looking at the end of August or the beginning of September.Telegram bot with transaction and login notifications is ready.More precisely, two bots - for merchant and personal accounts.To connect, click on the profile icon in the right corner of your personal account, go to settings and click to "Notifications".You're awesome!

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.created_time: August 05, 2022, 09:00:26 AMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 08:32:40 AM by LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomus_com on August 03, 2022, 07:53:59 AMGreat news! Big media is talking about us:Beincrypto and Bitcoinist released an article describing the features of our service.Those aren't big media, they're spammy (I say spammy because I only know them from many users spamming their link on Bitcointalk) websites that publish advertise anything they earn from. Did you pay Bitcoinist $750 to publish your press release? They don't verify any of the claims, even though the article makes it look as if they wrote it. I didn't even check the other site, this is shady enough.Quote from: SFR10 on July 23, 2022, 04:47:04 PMCare to explain why comments in your "What our clients say" section are fake?Quote from: cryptomus_com on July 27, 2022, 08:13:57 AM5. We have over 100,000 transactionsInteresting how you got 100,000 transactions without a real testimonial Quote from: cryptomus_com on August 03, 2022, 08:17:14 AMto get a licenseWhich country provides licenses for KYC-free money transmitting?

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV We are a new project, so these media publications are a big step for us. In the future, we will try to get more authoritative media to talk about us.We have a great sales department. They connect new users to our payment system every day - here 100k transactions. For fiat transactions the KYC procedure will be mandatory. For crypto payments everything will remain anonymous. We support the idea of decentralization and will try to promote it.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: cryptomus_com on August 08, 2022, 08:21:47 AMWe have a great sales department. They connect new users to our payment system every day - here 100k transactions. So, doing just the average math with no increase at all, since the start of your business till now, shouldn't there be already 200 00 transactions by now?¬† Seriously, why don't you try to do an honest business here, it will be so simple and it will stop people from criticizing you:- stop with the fake reviews and stop boasting about paid articles, nobody is going to get mad at you for promoting yourself through PR releases but even claiming somebody is interested in your business and that's why they've spent time to write about it is bull- stop claiming numbers you obviously don't have- stop pretending you have licenses just because you're right now thinking of applying for oneStart focusing on other things and stick to them:- promote the advantages of your platform over others, both technically and financially- come clean about who is behind this and where is located The most important thing is being honest about it, without this, you won't get anywhere, if your intention is to actually go there and not a quick $Quote from: cryptomus_com on August 08, 2022, 08:21:47 AMFor fiat transactions the KYC procedure will be mandatory. For crypto payments everything will remain anonymous. Is not going to work and you're going to get any EU license revoked immediately.You either operate without one outside of the EU and deal only with crypto or you do it with a license and you have mandatory KYC over financial transactions, it's not 2009 anymore, and although I dislike both the direction and the way things are going, this is the situation right now.

comments.author: cryptomus_com
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on August 08, 2022, 08:49:52 AM We've been working since March, so it's no wonder we've accumulated 100k transactions, right?About articles. When people write about us, we will share it. It's not bragging, it's our sincere joy. Mistakes happen, and we are mindful of every one of them. There is no deception on our part - we are honest about what we are not yet ready to tell you about the company's employees and we are still preparing all the necessary documentation. We talk about each of our updates and talk about the benefits, but you don't seem to notice them. No KYC, fees from 0.4, Telegram notification Bots, automatic withdrawal, flexible security system, automatic conversion will be ready soon - it will save you from dealing with exchangers and protect you from volatility. All this is just for the convenience of users, and we want you to see it. If you are not satisfied with our positive reviews, then try working with our platform and write your heartfelt review, to which we will definitely listen.
